short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Cute Animals Wallpaper in Each Chrome New Tab that is Sure to Make You Smile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Decorate your browser with cute, adorable, beautiful animal images and make your new tab page more appealing. 

If you are looking for a way to make your new tab experience more personal or just want to find some great wallpapers with animals, then this cute animals wallpaper theme is for you.

There are many ways to make your internet experience easier, faster, and more efficient. But one of the most popular choices are wallpapers for your new tab page.

**** 170+ Cute Animal Wallpaper Photos for Your Chrome Browser's New Tab ****

This extension has a whole bunch of backgrounds with different types of animals on them: cats, dogs, birds, horses, elephants,  pandas — you name it, it’s most probably there. 

Every time you open a new tab, you’ll see random new photo, selected from over 170 high resolution images. It doesn’t need internet connection (photos are stored locally, in your browser) so even if you are offline, the cute animal wallpaper will be there and no mobile internet will be used in case you are away with no wi-fi networks around.

**** Features **** 

> About 170 adorable animal pictures

> Random image on every new tab you open

> Works offline (images are downloaded and stored on your device)

> Selection of HD, high resolution pictures.

> Light-weight extension with virtually no memory consumption (only uses hard disk space to store the background photos)

**** Options / Settings ****

> You can select which shortcuts to show/hide on the front page

**** More Info & Support: ****

Visit the extension's home page for more:
https://openaddons.com/cute-animals-wallpaper/
